meanings.definition: A person who works with or takes care of donkeys.
meanings.sent1: The donkeymen fed the donkeys in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The donkeymen led the donkeys to the pasture.
meanings.sent3: The donkeymen joked about having a race with the donkeys.
meanings.sent4: The donkeymen were the unsung heroes of the farm.
meanings.sent5: The donkeymen knew each donkey by name.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of donkeymen walking with their donkeys.
meanings.sent2: The donkeymen were skilled in handling the stubborn animals.
meanings.sent3: The donkeymen gathered for a photo with all the donkeys.
meanings.sent4: The donkeymen stood out in the crowd with their donkeys.
meanings.sent5: The donkeymen worked tirelessly to care for their donkeys.
